name: Throat Chop
description: You focus in on an attack at the targetâ€™s throat. Make a melee attack, dealing 2d6 + MOVE dark damage on a hit. On hit, the target is unable to activate sound based attacks for its next 1d4 turns.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
